thread.title: Bersih to launch nationwide voter registration campaign
thread.title_full: Bersih to launch nationwide voter registration campaign

title: Bersih to launch nationwide voter registration campaign
text:
More 
Electoral reform movement Bersih is to launch a voter registration campaign that is expected to last throughout the month of March to encourage more eligible people to register as voters. 
"At the present moment, we are still under-registering our new voters. A total of 4.4 million qualified citizens aren't registered as voters yet. 
"Every quarter, it's 170,000 to 180,000 eligible new voters that have not been registered," Bersih chairperson Maria Chin Abdullah said at a press conference in Petaling Jaya today. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
